details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 5 Version identification - PDF/UA Identification Schema
details.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

rule.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

error.message: The document metadata stream doesn't contains PDF/UA Identification Schema
